metadata.title: CVE-2024-51058 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Local File Inclusion (LFI) vulnerability has been discovered in TCPDF6.7.5. This vulnerability enables a user to read arbitrary files from theserver's file system through src tag, potentially exposing sensitiveinformation.

criterions.comment: tcpdf package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
